title: 'I changed to long metal studs, I wanted to injure a Chelsea player' - FA contacts Rooney over comments
description: The FA is seeking observations from Wayne Rooney in relation to comments by the Derby County manager in a recent interview.

title: Ros Atkins On… PM's Starmer Savile claim
description: Ros Atkins looks at a false claim and protesters targeting the Labour leader near Parliament.

title: Future Queen Camilla makes her first public trip since Consort title revealed
description: This is the Duchess of Cornwall's first public appearance since the Queen revealed her future title.

title: Oscars 2022: Find out about the top 16 films in the awards race
description: With the gong-giving season picking up steam, we look at the nominees for the big awards.

title: Zhu Yi: US-born Chinese Olympic figure skater slated in China after falls
description: Zhu Yi fell during her team event sparking backlash from some social media users in China.

title: Winter Olympics: Tears, phenomenal skating & max passion - day four best bits
description: Watch some of the best moments from day four of the Winter Olympics in Beijing, where there were tears, collisions and "phenomenal" figure skating.

title: Winter Olympics: GB mixed doubles pair lose bronze-medal match to Sweden
description: Great Britain's curling mixed doubles pair lose their Winter Olympics bronze-medal match to Sweden.

title: Winter Olympics: Casey Dawson competes after 45 PCR tests, and on borrowed skates
description: After 45 PCR tests in three weeks and a frantic race around the globe, Casey Dawson finally realises his Olympic dream.

title: Winter Olympics: Andrew Young on cross-country sprint effort after Covid
description: Three weeks after catching Covid-19 and suffering "quite badly", Andrew Young can be proud he made it to the Olympic start line.

title: Long Covid: 'My shame over 18-month work absence'
description: Sian Griffiths swims to aid her recovery but feels ashamed she cannot go back to work.

title: 'From gestures to action' on diversity - F1 extends scholarship scheme but drops pre-race ceremony
description: Formula 1 boss Stefano Domenicali says it is time to move from "gestures" to "action" to increase diversity in motorsport.

title: Calls for windfall tax grow as BP's profits surge
description: The energy giant is benefitting from higher oil and gas prices which have pushed up bills for households.

title: Star names, new talent and the bravest of them all - why Australia's juggernaut is unstoppable
description: Why Australia are stacked in all departments and look the side to beat in the forthcoming 50-over World Cup, after an Ashes demolition of England.

title: Bamber Gascoigne: Original University Challenge presenter dies at 87
description: The TV presenter fronted the quiz show throughout its original run on ITV between 1962 and 1987.

title: Canada truckers protest: Trudeau demands an end to trucker protest
description: The PM says Canadians are "shocked and disgusted" by the behaviour of some of the protesters in Ottawa.

title: EuroMillions: UK ticketholder claims £109.9m jackpot
description: Friday's prize would put the ticketholder in 10th place on the National Lottery's rich list.

title: BBC presenter John Watson slips down ski slope in live television segment
description: John Watson was attempting to ski down the slope in a live segment on BBC Breakfast.

title: Keir Starmer: No 10 has no intention of apologising after protesters surround Labour leader
description: A No 10 source says Boris Johnson's "got other stuff to get on with", despite demands from his own MPs.

title: Britain will not flinch over Ukraine, Boris Johnson tells Russia
description: Boris Johnson says the UK will seek new powers to impose sanctions if Moscow invades.

title: Blood pressure warning over long-term paracetamol use
description: Prescribing the painkiller for chronic pain could have risks, as well as benefits, a study finds.

title: Encanto: Why We Don't Talk About Bruno won't win an Oscar
description: We Don't Talk About Bruno has been number one for weeks, so why won't it be nominated?

title: Winter Olympics: 'Snow Princess' Eileen Gu delivers ski big air gold for China
description: China's Eileen Gu produces a spectacular final jump to win gold in the ski big air at the Beijing Winter Olympics.

title: Kurt Zouma: West Ham condemn defender as video emerges of him hitting pet cat
description: West Ham "unreservedly condemn" Kurt Zouma after a video emerges of the defender hitting his pet cat.

title: World-title shot or bout with Benn - what's next for ambitious Eubank Jr?
description: After beating Liam Williams in Cardiff, could a world-title shot be next for Chris Eubank Jr? Or is Conor Benn at catchweight a real possibility?

title: Winter Olympics: Nathan Chen breaks world short program record
description: Nathan Chen of the United States takes control of the men's figure skating competition by delivering a world record score of 113.97 in the short programme.

title: The Papers: Starmer flees from mob and Kate reads bedtime book
description: Protesters surrounding the Labour leader near Parliament make many of Tuesday's front pages.

title: Winter Olympics: China's Eileen Gu wins women's freestyle skiing big air gold
description: Eileen Gu delivers a stunning final jump to grab a dramatic gold in the women's freestyle skiing big air final as Team GB's Kirsty Muir finishes fifth.

title: NHS spending: How much money does it need?
description: Life-changing treatments don't always come cheap, so how should the NHS cut its cloth?

title: Brit Awards 2022: Who's performing and who's going to win?
description: The ceremony takes place at the O2 Arena on Tuesday, with Adele and Ed Sheeran

title: Worrying numbers of older children having energy drinks regularly
description: Up to a third of UK children - mostly teens - consume at least one energy drink a week, research reveals.

title: Ros Atkins on... the Canada truckers protest
description: The BBC's Ros Atkins explains why truck drivers protesting against a vaccine mandate are blocking roads in Ottawa.

title: Film starring deaf actors is getting buzz this Oscar season
description: CODA tells the story of a hearing child raised in a deaf family and features a nearly all deaf cast.

title: Microsoft's mega-deal worries small video game makers
description: Indie games developers are nervous they will be squeezed out if the big firms' dominance grows.

title: Academy Awards: Hollywood prepares for Oscar nominations
description: The Power of the Dog, Belfast, Dune and West Side Story are expected to be recognised.

title: John Simpson in Afghanistan: Watching the destruction of a nation?
description: The BBC's John Simpson returns to Afghanistan and finds a country on the brink of famine.

title: The people fighting price rises by trying to buy nothing
description: A surge of interest in Buy Nothing groups is a sign buyers are hunting for new ways to avoid inflation.

title: The Jews dressing as Muslims to get around a prayer ban
description: Some extremist Jews reveal that they have been dressing as Muslims to enter and worship at Temple Mount/al-Aqsa Mosque compound.

title: Porn sites will be legally required to verify users' age
description: Users may be asked to prove they own a credit card or confirm their age, under new UK rules.
